attributes.action: Removal of soft pornography channels from Freeview
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to actively discuss the removal or scrambling of the soft pornography channels broadcast on the Digital Terrestrial Platform known as Freeview.
Many children can gain access to these channels, often without their parents knowledge.
We must help protect our children and prevent them viewing this material and being encouraged to call the associated premium telephone numbers.
